title: Issue with the sum of Shap values of each classes and summary_plot
body:
Hi, 

I am using DeepExplainer as explainer to obtain my shap_values : 

`X = X_train_scaled_model`
`explainer = shap.DeepExplainer(model, X)`
`shap_values = explainer.shap_values(X)`

Then I used summary_plot to observe the impact of each feature on my model. 


`shap.summary_plot(shap_values, class_names=Hours_lst, max_display=10,plot_size=(10,9),show=False)`

![Figure_2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/59099630/98568771-c388a480-22b1-11eb-8183-5d954aec1854.png)

I decided to sum all the Shap values of each classes in order to remove the legend (sure there is a better way) , but I did not find the same result as above (Feature 2 take a new value) : 

`shap.summary_plot(np.array(shap_values).sum(axis=0),plot_size=(10,8), plot_type="bar", max_display=10,show=False)`

![Figure_1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/59099630/98568769-c2f00e00-22b1-11eb-88bf-60bf629e16a6.png)

Does anyone have any idea what is happening here?
